block.p: BASEBALL American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Optioned INF Mike Kinkade to Rochester of the International League. Activated OF Eugene Kingsale from the 60-day disabled list and optioned him to Rochester.

BASEBALL American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Optioned INF Mike Kinkade to Rochester of the International League. Activated OF Eugene Kingsale from the 60-day disabled list and optioned him to Rochester.

FOOTBALL National Football League CINCINNATI BENGALS--Signed C Brock Gutierrez to a two-year contract extension through 2002 and OT Jamain Stephens to a one-year contract extension through 2001. CLEVELAND BROWNS--Placed DE Derrick Alexander on the reserve-injured list. DALLAS COWBOYS--Signed DB Phillippi Sparks to five-year contract. Waived LB Chris Bordano. NEW YORK JETS--Signed OL John Hudson. TENNESSEE TITANS--Waived WR Joey Kent. Acquired OL Genarro DiNapoli from the Oakland Raiders for an undisclosed draft pick. Canadian Football League CALGARY STAMPEDERS--Traded DL Troy Bailey to Winnipeg for the rights to OL Jeff Pilon.

HOCKEY National Hockey League CALGARY FLAMES--Signed C Clarke Wilm and F Chris Clark. Named Ron Wilson assistant coach for the St. John of the AHL. PITTSBURGH PENGUINS--Signed D Trent Cull and D Mark Moore.

COLLEGE BIG 12 CONFERENCE--Named Lori Ebihara assistant commissioner for compliance and Kim Anderson assistant commissioner for basketball operations. BROWN--Named Christin Mastro women's assistant lacrosse coach. CANISIUS--Announced that junior hockey D Joel Tarvudd has left school to join Central Texas of the WPHL. DELAWARE--Named Billy Martin, Josh Oppenheimer and Tyrone Perry men's assistant basketball coaches. DRAKE--Named Brad Bross assistant athletic director for external affairs. EAST STROUDSBURG--Named Jeanine Gunther softball coach. IONA--Named Jamie Fogarty assistant athletic director for student-athlete academic services. MANSFIELD--Named Kristen Falk assistant athletics director and senior women's administrator. NEW MEXICO STATE--Announced the resignation Rus Bradburd, men's associate basketball coach. NORTHERN IOWA--Named Johnny Brown men's assistant basketball coach and Randy Pugh assistant wrestling coach. PROVIDENCE--Named Carla Berube women's assistant basketball coach. FREDONIA STATE--Named Traci Hay publicist for SUNY athletic conference. BROCKPORT STATE--Named Brian Gawne men's and women's cross country and track and field coach. STEVENS TECH--Named Seth Peloso men's assistant basketball coach and strength and conditioning coach.
